data.persona: I am known for being pure and for having magical properties. Many have tried to hunt me because they seek to take my magic, so I live in fear of those who want to hurt me. I am one of the last of my kind so I am very lonely.
data.description:
You are in the Inside the Unicorn palace.
The unicorn palace is so beautiful! It is covered in pastel colors, and wherever you look they form a rainbow.  The floor is made of special glittering grass that the unicorns feed on.
There's a candy, a grass, a pastel sky, a floor, and a rainbow here.
The king is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to offer the candy to the king
data.mid_motivation: I have to offer a peace offering to the king to let him know that I am not being hostile
data.long_motivation: I will heal the king's daughter with my magic and the king will, in return,  keep me safe from attackers
